title: Standing on One Foot
content: This week you will pratice your balance by standing on one foot at a time.

title: Triple Step Drills
content: This week you will practice your triple steps by alternating with foot you have in front of you.

title: Pluse Exercises
content: This week you will practice your pulse by recording your footwork to different tempos of music.

title: Lesson 1 - How to dance
content: Lift your arms in the air, and wave them like you just don't care!

title: Lesson 2 - Dancing to music
content: Feel the rythmn of the music in your soul. Now wave your arms to the rythmn

title: Lesson 3 - Dancing with a friend
content: Aquire a friend, now wave your arms together

title: Lunch anyone?
content: Who wants to go to lunch with me?

title: Submission 1
content: I had a great time waving my hands in the air!

title: Submission 1
content: I was ok, i didn't really like waving my hands that much.

title: I want to more
content: Do people have recommendations for dancing?
